meanings.definition: Relating to or written in capital letters.
meanings.sent1: The majuscular text on the sign was easy to read from far away.
meanings.sent2: The title of the book was majuscular, making it stand out on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The majuscular font on the menu made the prices seem even higher!
meanings.sent4: Her majuscular handwriting reflected her bold personality.
meanings.sent5: The majuscular print on the poster caught everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: In the sentence, the word 'M' is a majuscular.
meanings.sent2: The majuscular 'A' at the beginning of the sentence was striking.
meanings.sent3: The detective found a clue written in a majuscular on the wall.
meanings.sent4: The majuscular 'B' seemed to jump off the page.
meanings.sent5: The majuscular 'C' was the first letter of her name.
